text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode
of Laura in the kitchen I'm going to
show you how to make M&M cookies now I
did an episode recently on oatmeal
cranberry cookies where I mentioned and
whenever cookies and everybody started
going wild so I figured today's the day
so let's go over the ingredients so you
can get started you'll need some
all-purpose flour some regular sugar
brown sugar some plain milk chocolate
M&Ms some unsalted butter at room
temperature eggs baking soda salt and
vanilla extract now it's super important
that you use unsalted butter at room
temperature otherwise this is not going
to cream up well and the first thing you
want to do is get your oven to 375 the
second thing you want to do is line your
baking sheets with parchment paper my
parchment paper is not cooperating with
me today because it's the end of the
roll and it's just rolling up on itself
but I'm not going to worry about that so
I'm gonna make this in my mixer but as
always you can just use a bowl with a
whisk and a wooden spoon and they will
work just as well now this is basically
my chocolate chip cookie dough pretty
much mine is the shortening but it's
going to be super simple now in the
mixer I'm going to put in my unsalted
butter it's nice and soft and I'm going
to put in both kinds of sugar now if you
want to if you don't have brown sugar
then you can do the whole thing with
regular sugar but I suggest looking for
the brown sugar because it gives it a
little extra sort of molasses eat like
almost like molasses in there so it's
really good so I'm just going to cream
this together for about a minute
once your butter and sugars are well
mixed I'm going to add in my eggs and
some vanilla extract about a teaspoon
and a half and now just let them mix
until the eggs are well incorporated and
everything is super creamy that looks
good
now before you add any dry ingredients
just make sure you take a spatula and
you run it on the sides just to make
sure that everything is well mixed so
really quickly take your flour baking
soda and salt mix this together just
very very briefly doesn't have to be
perfect
now I'm going to put this right in here
put this down turn the speed on low
otherwise you'd be covered in flour and
mix it just enough until the flour is
combined you don't want to mix this for
a minute or two you want to mix it for
like twenty to thirty seconds otherwise
like I always said you're not gonna get
a chewy cookie you're going to get like
a hockey puck it's going to be super
super hard if you overwork the flour so
just mix it through for about twenty to
thirty seconds that's perfect and it
only took about 20 seconds now to this
while it's running just don't--i low
you're going to add in your M&Ms and you
can really add as much or as little as

and a half or so but the written recipe

just add in your M&Ms until they're

in and that's it they're mixed just
enough to incorporate but never over mix
the only time you ever want to over mix
us if you're making like pizza dough or
bread dough or cinnamon rolls or any
like elastic dough like that because you
want the gluten you want to work the
gluten but this time you don't want you
make cookies or muffins or cakes you
don't so get that off there as much as
you can get to the side and now mix it
well with your spatula sometimes you
just get those little pieces like it's

okay move this out of the way move is

now you know what I'm going to use my

even
jeez every single time and just know how

apart so when they bake they don't bake

last one now this dough freezes
beautifully in fact I'm not going to
bake half a batch put the remaining half
in the freezer so that I can have
homemade cookies in like 15 minutes once
it's thawed so there you go now I ran
out of parchment paper but a great tip
as always when you have a nonstick
cooking sheet is to always spray with
some nonstick cooking spray if you don't
have parchment paper it doesn't stick
and these are going to go into the oven
at 375 between 9 to 11 minutes you're
looking for a golden brown and they're
gonna be perfect and you're gonna let

my cookies baked for about 9 to 10
minutes and then all I did was let them
